page.title: 12THE VET
page.content: My dad is a vet.He works at Kedleston, Mickleover and Duffield surgery. Sometimes he gets called out in the night, 3 or 4 times a week - far too many! The nicest thing in a vet's life is bringing new animals into the world, (puppies, kittens, etc). The worst thing is putting animals to sleep, especially if they belong to old people and the animals are their only friends. The strangest thing which ever happened to my dad was when he had to inject penicillin into an elephant from the circus. When dad is on duty (that means he works in the morning, noon or at night) he works in the office, in villages, in the country or in some towns. When dad is not too busy, my brother and I go with him.
